# mAudioDataBytesCapacity

**Instance Property**

The size of the audio queue buffer, in bytes. This size is set when a buffer is allocated and cannot be changed.

## Declaration

```swift
var mAudioDataBytesCapacity: UInt32 { get }
```
title: mAudioDataBytesCapacity
